//Import Sample

Sample058:
#incbin "FE7_Tuba.bin"
Sample055:
#incbin "FE6_Orchestral.bin"
Sample012:
#incbin "FE7_Marimba.bin"

//DrumFix
PUSH

ORG	$212564
#incbin "neoDrumFix1.dmp"
ORG	$212E64
#incbin "neoDrumFix2.dmp"
//#incbin "Drum_Fix.bin"

POP

//12sounds
PUSH

ORG	$2851
BYTE	0xE0
ORG	$2874
BYTE	0x0C
ORG	$2878
BYTE	0x0C
ORG	$2140BC
BYTE	0x10
ORG	$2140C4
SHORT	0x67A0
ORG	$2140C8
BYTE	0x10

POP

//SoundMixer
PUSH

ORG	$D4EC4
POIN	Mixer

ORG	$D4EC8
WORD	$03006CB0
SHORT	$0218

ORG $D4234
WORD	$03006CB1

POP

Mixer:
#incbin "FE8_Improved_Sound_Mixer.bin"

ALIGN	4
